content.rendered: The Office of Educational Effectiveness (OEE) supports the University’s efforts to enhance a culture of inquiry and evidence, prioritizes student-centered learning, and a spirit of continuous improvement for student success. OEE contributes to broader college efforts supporting faculty in Academic Program Review and executing the Academic Assessment Plan for the University. OEE, in partnership with members of the University community, offers a variety of assessment workshops, training, and consulting support for faculty, staff, and administrators. Resources for academic program, general education, and institutional assessment are provided in the Assessment Resource Hub.
